author: Nico Lang, Michelle Garcia
title: Gay Bars Bet on Virtual Happy Hours to Save Them From Extinction
description: "Our community’s gone through so many things, and to be taken out by this virus... I just can’t accept it."
content: Shelley Brothers doesnt know how much longer her bar can survive. For 17 years, Brothers has been co-owner of Wildrose, a homey storefront bar with giant windows overlooking Seattles Capitol Hill. The bar, which has been open since 1984, has persisted even as… [+10070 chars]
